ibbt.sumo.sampleevaluators.distributed
Class JobPoller

java.lang.Object
  ibbt.sumo.sampleevaluators.distributed.JobPoller
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SSHResultPoller
public abstract class JobPoller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Distributed backends need their own poller to check for job status information. Such pollers should subclass this class
